maqras.text: Ana nganitunsapangulila (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chidali chenu (pakumpa utume)
Ni tuntuusile nsigo wenu (wausito wa kalungusye ka utenga, pakun’jepepachisya kalungusye kakwe)
Awula (nsigo wakwe) wawalumbisye n'gongo wenu
Ni tunnyakuliile kusaalidwa kwenu
Basi chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Sano pati mmalisyisye (masengo genu), basi limbichilani (kutenda ibada)
Soni kwa Ambuje ŵenu pe (Allah) basi sachililani (ukoto Wakwe)
Nguulumbila nkuju ni nzaituni
Ni litumbi lya Sinai
Kwisa soni awu nsinda (wa Maaka) wantunjelele
Chisimu pamasile patun'gumbile mundu mu kagumbidwe kambone nnope
Kaneka nitukum'busyaaga kuŵa jwapasi kwapunda ŵapasi wosope (pa uchekulu wakulepela nao kutenda yambone)
Ikaŵeje ŵandu ŵaakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone (ali ŵachilimbanganile), basi akwete kupata ŵanganyao malipilo gangamala
Ana panyuma (pa kuimanya yele) nichichi chikuntendekasya kanila ya malipilo (ga pa Kiyama)
Ana Allah nganaŵa Nkwiilanya chenene (magambo) kwapunda akwiilanya wosope
Soomani mu lina lya Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) ŵaagumbile
Agumbile mundu kuumila mu chipande chamyasi jekamatane
Soomani! Soni Ambuje ŵenu ni Ŵantuka kusyene
Aŵala ŵaajiganyisye (kulemba) ni chakulembela
An'jiganyisye mundu yaŵalekaga ngaimanya
Yakuona! Chisimu mundu akuŵaga jwakusumba mpika (pa kulikwesya)
Ligongo lyakuliona kusichila
Chisimu kwa Ambuje ŵenu pe (Allah) ni kwakuujila
Ana mum'bweni ajula jwaakuŵa nkunkaanya
Kapolo (jwa Allah) ndema jajukusaka kuswali
Ana nkuyiona uli najuŵaga (Muhammadi ﷺ) juli pachongoko
Kapena jukulamula ya woga (wakun'jogopa Allah)
Nambi nkuyiona uli naŵaga (Abujahalio) akukanila ni kusyulula
Ana ngaakumanyilila yanti Allah akwaona (yaakutenda)
Ngwamba! Chisimu naga ngaakuleka, chiitwawuta umbo syapewuwo (pakwaponya ku Moto)
Liwuwo lyakwe lyaunami soni lyakulemwa
Basi ŵaaŵilanje ŵandu ŵakwe (kuti ankamuchisye)
Nowe chitwaŵilanje Azabaniya (asilikali ŵa ku Moto)
Ngwamba! Mmwe ngasimunkunda jwalakwejo, nambo nsujuduji (kuswali) ni n’diŵandichisyeje (kwa Allah)
Chisimu Uwwe tujitulwisye jalakwe (Qur'aniji) m’Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Chilo Chakuchimbichikachi chiŵele chambone nnope kupunda myesi jakwana sausande
Achimalaika akasatulukaga pamo ni Nsimu (Jibulilu) mu Chele (Chilochi) kwa lisosa lya M’mbuje gwao, kwisa kulondesya chindu chilichose (pakuchiŵika mu mpango wakwe)
Ntunjelele-tunjelelepe! Chele Chilocho, mpaka kumasikusiku

Ŵandu achimakafili kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni ŵakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), nganaŵa alekangene (ni ukafili wao) kwikanila ndema ja chayichilile chilosyo chakuonechela palangulangu
(Jwali) Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ) jwakuumila kwa Allah jwaakusooma (Qur’an jajili mu) ikalakala yakuswejesyedwa
Mwalakwemo mwana malamusi gagoloka

Chisimu Allah akupeleka chanasa kwa Ntume (Muhammadi ﷺ), nombe nao soni Achimalaika (akum’bombelaga chanasa Ntumejo ﷺ). E jenumanja ŵankulupilile! Mum’bombelani chanasa jwalakwe ni kum’bombela soni ntendele

Ni nganalamulidwa ikaŵeje yanti an'galagatileje Allah mwakunswejechesya dini Jakwe pakupendechela ku Uujika Wakwe (nikutalikangana nayo isanamu), nikuti ajimicheje Swala mwakolosya ni kutolaga Zaka, soni jalakwejo ni dini jagoloka

Chisimu ŵandu ŵaakanile (dini ja Usilamu); kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni ŵakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), chakaŵe m’moto wa Jahannama, chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo. Ŵanganyao ni iŵumbe yakusakala nnope
Chisimu ŵandu ŵaakulupilile nikutendaga yambone, ŵanganyao ni iwumbe yambone nnope

Malipilo gao kwa Ambuje ŵao chigakaŵe Matimbe Gandamo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pamalipilo gataachaapa). Yalakweyo ni yamundu jwatan'jogope M'mbujeegwe (Allah)
Pandema jalichitenganyika litaka nichisikinya chakwe chamachili
Ni kwisa koposya litaka misigo jakwe jausito (ichindu yayaliji nkati mwakwe, mpela malilo ni mitapo jambiya)
Ni kwisa kuŵecheta mundu (mwawoga soni mwakusimonga kuti): “Litite uli (litaka, ana Kiyama jiyiche?)”
Lyele lisikulyo (litaka) lichiŵecheta abali syakwe syosope (sya indu yayatendekwele pachanya pakwe yambone kapena yakusakala)
Ligongo lyanti Ambuje ŵenu tachililamula lyalakwelyo (kuti liŵechete)
Lyele lisikulyo ŵandu tachipwilingana ali m'mikutula jakulekangana-lekangana kuti akaalosye masengo gao
Basi jwatapanganye chambone chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Nombe soni jwatapanganye chakusakala chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Ngusilumbila hachi syasikuwutuka sili nkupumasika
Ni syasikoposya moto mu ikotwa mwakwe (pakuwutuka m’maganga)
Ni syasikwagungumuchila amagongo kumasikusiku
Nikututumya palakwepo luwundu lwejinji
Nikulijinjilila palakwepo likuga (lya amagongo)
Chisimu mundu kwa Ambujegwe (Allah) juŵele jwakanila (ukoto waakumpa)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe jukuŵichila umboni pa yalakweyo (kupitila mu itendo yakwe)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe pakuchinonyela chipanje juŵele jwakupelenganya nnope
